sentence: Bathroom was large and the shower drain actually worked

The Westin Westminster offers a running concierge for daily 3mile group runs running maps a nicely equipped gym indoor pool albeit small and even lends you New Balance shoes socks and workout clothes which are delivered to your room for 5
Excellent bed and room
Views from window on 9th floor on mountain side are excellent
Perfect location with a view of the mountains
The look and the style of the hotel are fitting for the Calarado area

The Westin Westminster is a beautiful property and with the Westminster promenade within walking distance it is a great choice for families wanting a one stop experience in North Denver as long as they do not mind a postage stamp size room
We had a corner room and the view was beautiful
very clean rooms comfortable bed and friendly staff
Luckily all of the rooms have a good view
I have to share this end to our trip which changed my point of view of the hotel and management
Not only was it in a great location but the views were amazing and every one was so niceI will definitely be back with my family next time
The hot tub jets have a mind of their own

I was really surprised for the high caliper the Westin is that it did not have microwaves in the room free Wi Fi and free breakfast and happy hour for guests that was not comparable to lower priced hotels in the area otherwise beds very comfortable great view toward the west also hostess seem rude in restaurant inside by lobby because we did not have reservations seats were empty all around and gave us a very uncomfortable seat hostess did not come back for ten minutes very overpriced meals so we walked out and got great service and a better meal somewhere else for half the price listed hereat least hotel lobby person was very helpful
Upon arrival we were informed that all king rooms had been rented
We ordered room service for evening
Make sure you get the room you book
Otherwise it had the prettiest views I lucked out and got a Mountain view room
I would have given this hotel all 10s except the bathroom was very dirty
Hotel room shuffle
We also arrive one night and our room was not done so when we call the front desk they only say that we might have left the do not disturb sign which we did not do
I was thinking of taking a hot tub but we went to the pool which was overrun with kids and found there was no hot tub after all
The reason for the average rating is because the room 1416 looked old dusty had a fly as we walked in but the cherry on top the mattress
I guess they redid bathrooms a few months ago
Paid in excess of 400 a night for the romPlumbing issues in the bathromTub faucet leaked and dripped all nightWhile taking a shower the tub filled with water that would not drain
As a side note the hot water handle was very loose and the shower door was at an angle so it opened by itself periodically
Dirty windows and noises from plumbing
All was good except there was n’t any way to get breakfast in the room at 6 am
You would think that whoever was in charge of room blocks for the hotel would reach out immediately to clients to let them know the change in staffing

Next the TV remote control did not work it was as if the batteries were dying and we could not open the back to readjust them when we told the front desk they apologized but no TV other than the Mariot commercials for 3 days and last is the worst the toilet would not flush on the first try whereas the second would fill the bowl for about five minutes rendering it unusable for about five minutes then flush it would fill to the top leaving us in fear of an overflow again they apologized but it was a tough workaround with a schedule as we often were forced to the lobby restrooms to meet our ride schedules this is not an enjoyable way to get ready
